com.lavanya.api.controller

Class CommentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lavanya.api.controller.CommentController

  • @RestController
public class CommentController
extends java.lang.Object
    Rest Controller to control all the requests related to Comment object.

    • Method Detail

      • saveComment

        @PostMapping(value="saveComment/{id}")
public CommentDto saveComment(@RequestBody
                                                                      CommentDto commentDto,
                                                                      @PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                      int childcareId,
                                                                      @RequestParam(value="feedbackAuthor")
                                                                      java.lang.String feedbackAuthor)
        POST requests for saveComment/{id} endpoint. method to save a comment.
        Parameters:
        commentDto - that needs to mapped to comment entity to be saved in DB.
        childcareId - id of the childcare for which the comment is made.
        feedbackAuthor - determines if the author of the comment is the user in charge or the user in need.
        Returns:
        CommentDto

      • getListOfCommentsByUserId

        @GetMapping(value="user/comments/{id}")
public java.util.List<CommentDto> getListOfCommentsByUserId(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                     java.util.UUID userId)
        GET requests for user/comments/{id} endpoint. method to retrieve list of all comments made on a particular user.
        Parameters:
        userId - uuid of the user of interest for whom we need the list of comments.
        Returns:
        list of CommentDtos.
